msglock.relock: Re-locked the chat from player %s to %s.
msglock.norelock: The chat is already locked on player %s.
msglock.not_online.unlock: Player %s is not online anymore! The chat is unlocked.
msglock.not_online.nolock: Player %s is not online! The chat is not locked.
msglock.not_online.locked: Player %s is not online! The chat is still locked on %s.
